# Resources {#resources}

## Credits

For this course materials have been adapted from:
 
  - Wickham and Grolemund, "R for Data Science", 2017, O'Reily
  - Field et. al., 2015, "Discovering Statistics Using R", Sage Publications Ltd.
  - Using R for Offical Statistics Symposium - CBS - 2018
  - CSAMA Course for Genome Statitics - 2018
  - Materials from https://github.com/NCEAS/oss-lessons "National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis" and many others. For a complete list see \@ref(references)
